comments.raw_text: I was unable to figure out what the HTTP content type for about:home snippets is. If it is text/html or an XML content type, it would be prudent to set responseType to "text" after calling open() when loading the snippets to make sure the markup parser doesn't run.
comments.author: hsivonen@mozilla.com
comments.text: I was unable to figure out what the HTTP content type for about:home snippets is. If it is text/html or an XML content type, it would be prudent to set responseType to "text" after calling open() when loading the snippets to make sure the markup parser doesn't run.
comments.creator: hsivonen@mozilla.com
